mapper.select: SELECT SB.SUB_SEQ, SB.SUB_CATEGORY, SB.MAJOR_NUMBER, SB.SUB_SEMESTER, SB.SUB_NAME, SB.PROFESSOR_ID, SB.PROFESSOR_NAME, SB.SUB_INFO, A.STUDENT_ID, ST.STUDENT_NAME, SB.SUB_S_CLASS, SB.SUB_E_CLASS,SB.SUB_GRADE, SB.SUB_POINT FROM SUBJECT SB, STUDENT ST, ASSESSMENT A WHERE SB.SUB_SEQ = A.SUB_SEQ_NUM AND A.STUDENT_ID = #{student_id} AND A.STUDENT_ID = ST.STUDENT_ID AND A.PROFESSOR_GRADE = 0 ORDER BY SB.SUB_S_CLASS ASC, SB.SUB_E_CLASS ASC

SELECT E.ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS_SEQ, E.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, E.TITLE , E.CONTENT , E.READCOUNT, E.FILENAME,ORG_FILENAME, E.WDATE, E.SUB_SEQ FROM ( SELECT ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, TITLE , CONTENT , READCOUNT, FILENAME,ORG_FILENAME, WDATE, SUB_SEQ, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS_SEQ desc) R FROM ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS ) E,USERS U WHERE SUB_SEQ=#{sub_seq} AND E.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND R BETWEEN #{startArticle} and #{endArticle} ORDER BY ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS (ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, TITLE , CONTENT , READCOUNT, FILENAME,WDATE, SUB_SEQ, ORG_FILENAME) VALUES(ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{title},#{content},0,#{filename}, SYSDATE,#{sub_seq},#{org_filename})
mapper.select: SELECT ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID,TITLE , CONTENT , READCOUNT, FILENAME, ORG_FILENAME, WDATE, SUB_SEQ FROM ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS WHERE ECLASS_NOTICE_BBS_SEQ=#{eclass_notice_bbs_seq}

SELECT E.ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ, E.USER_ID, E.TITLE , E.CONTENT ,E.READCOUNT, E.FILENAME,E.ORG_FILENAME, E.STATUS, E.WDATE, E.SDATE, E.EDATE, E.SUB_SEQ, U.USER_NAME FROM ( SELECT ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID,TITLE , CONTENT , READCOUNT, FILENAME,ORG_FILENAME, STATUS, WDATE, SDATE, EDATE, SUB_SEQ, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ desc) R FROM ECLASS_PDS_BBS ) E,USERS U WHERE SUB_SEQ= #{sub_seq} AND E.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND R BETWEEN #{startArticle} and #{endArticle} ORDER BY ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ DESC

SELECT E.ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ, E.USER_ID,TITLE , E.CONTENT , E.READCOUNT, E.FILENAME, E.ORG_FILENAME, E.STATUS, E.WDATE, E.SDATE, E.EDATE, E.SUB_SEQ, U.USER_NAME FROM ECLASS_PDS_BBS E, USERS U WHERE ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ= #{eclass_pds_bbs_seq} AND E.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ECLASS_PDS_BBS (ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, READCOUNT, FILENAME, ORG_FILENAME, STATUS, WDATE, SDATE , EDATE, SUB_SEQ) VALUES (ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{user_id}, #{title},#{content},0,#{filename}, #{org_filename},0,SYSDATE, #{sdate},#{edate},#{sub_seq})
mapper.update: UPDATE ECLASS_PDS_BBS SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, FILENAME=#{filename}, ORG_FILENAME=#{org_filename}, SDATE=#{sdate}, EDATE=#{edate} WHERE ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ=#{eclass_pds_bbs_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT E.ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ,E.C_SEQ,E.C_CONTENT,E.USER_ID,E.ORG_FILENAME,E.FILENAME,E.WDATE, U.USER_NAME FROM ( SELECT ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ,C_SEQ,C_CONTENT,USER_ID,ORG_FILENAME,FILENAME,WDATE FROM ECLASS_COMMENTS ) E, USERS U WHERE ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ = #{eclass_pds_bbs_seq} AND E.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY C_SEQ ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ECLASS_COMMENTS (ECLASS_PDS_BBS_SEQ, C_SEQ, C_CONTENT, USER_ID, ORG_FILENAME, FILENAME, WDATE, SUB_SEQ) VALUES(#{eclass_pds_bbs_seq}, COMMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{c_content}, #{user_id}, #{org_filename}, #{filename}, SYSDATE, #{sub_seq})
